mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_VIEWS, BOARD_INTRODUCTION, BOARD_DESCRIPTION, FILTER_TYPE, FILTER_AREA, FILTER_NUM, FILTER_DIRECTION, FILTER_PAST, FILTER_LOCAL, FILTER_FAMILY, FILTER_PET, FILTER_FAMILY_MEM_CNT, FILTER_FIELD, FILTER_WORKER, FILTER_RANGE, FILTER_PERIOD, FILTER_PERIOD_TYPE, FILTER_CONSTRUCTION_PRICE, FILTER_STYLE_PRICE, FILTER_URL, FILTER_COPYRIGHT, MEMBERS_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_PDID.NEXTVAL, #{boardTitle}, #{boardViews}, #{introduction}, #{description}, #{filType}, #{filArea}, #{filNum}, #{filDirection}, #{filPast}, #{filLocal}, #{filFamily}, #{filPet}, #{filFamMemCnt}, #{filField}, #{filWorker}, #{filRange}, #{filPeriod}, #{filPeriodType}, #{filConPrice}, #{filStPrice}, #{filUrl}, #{filCopy}, #{boardWriter}, #{boardStatus} )
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_VIEWS, TO_CHAR(BOARD_CREATE_TIME, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS "BOARD_CREATE_TIME", TO_CHAR(BOARD_MODIFY_TIME, 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS "BOARD_MODIFY_TIME", BOARD_INTRODUCTION, BOARD_DESCRIPTION, FILTER_TYPE, FILTER_AREA, FILTER_NUM, FILTER_DIRECTION, FILTER_PAST, FILTER_LOCAL, FILTER_FAMILY, FILTER_PET, FILTER_FAMILY_MEM_CNT, FILTER_FIELD, FILTER_WORKER, FILTER_RANGE, FILTER_PERIOD, FILTER_PERIOD_TYPE, FILTER_CONSTRUCTION_PRICE, FILTER_STYLE_PRICE, FILTER_URL, FILTER_COPYRIGHT, MEMBERS_ID AS "BOARD_WRITER" FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBERS USING (MEMBERS_NO) WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId} AND BOARD_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT B.BOARD_ID, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_VIEWS, FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME AS "BOARD_THUMBNAIL", B.MEMBERS_NO AS "BOARD_WRITER", ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SCRAP S WHERE S.BOARD_ID = B.BOARD_ID ) AS "SCRAP_COUNT" FROM BOARD B JOIN MEDIA MED ON (B.BOARD_ID = MED.BOARD_ID) JOIN MEMBERS MEM ON (B.MEMBERS_NO = MEM.MEMBERS_NO) WHERE BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 ORDER BY BOARD_CREATE_TIME DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_TITLE = #{boardTitle}, BOARD_INTRODUCTION = #{boardIntroduction}, BOARD_DESCRIPTION = #{board}, FILTER_TYPE = #{filType}, FILTER_AREA = #{filArea}, FILTER_NUM = #{filNum}, FILTER_DIRECTION = #{filDirection}, FILTER_PAST = #{filPast}, FILTER_LOCAL = #{filLocal}, FILTER_FAMILY = #{filFamily}, FILTER_PET = #{filPet}, FILTER_FAMILY_MEM_CNT = #{filFamMemCnt}, FILTER_FIELD = #{filField}, FILTER_WORKER = #{filWorker}, FILTER_RANGE = #{filRange}, FILTER_PERIOD = #{filPeriod}, FILTER_PERIOD_TYPE = #{filPeriodType}, FILTER_CONSTRUCTION_PRICE = #{filConPrice}, FILTER_STYLE_PRICE = #{filStPrice}, FILTER_URL = #{filUrl}, FILTER_COPYRIGHT = #{filCopy}, BOARD_MODIFY_TIME = SYSDATE WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_VIEWS = BOARD_VIEWS + 1 WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId} AND BOARD_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEDIA ( MEDIA_ID, BOARD_ID, MEDIA_TYPE, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH, FILE_LEVEL ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEDID.NEXTVAL, SEQ_BODID.CURRVAL, 1, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath}, 1 )
INSERT INTO MEDIA ( MEDIA_ID, BOARD_ID MEDIA_TYPE, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEDID.NEXTVAL, SEQ_BODID.CURRVAL #{mediaType}, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath} )
INSERT INTO MEDIA ( MEDIA_ID, BOARD_ID, MEDIA_TYPE, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEDID.NEXTVAL, #{mediaBoardId}, #{mediaType}, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath} )
mapper.select: SELECT MEDIA_ID, MEDIA_TYPE, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_PATH FROM MEDIA WHERE BOARD_ID = #{mediaBoardId} AND MEDIA_STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCRAP ( SCRAP_ID, SCRAP_TYPE, MEMBERS_NO, BOARD_ID, ) VALUES ( SEQ_SCRID.NEXTVAL, 3, #{scrapMembersNo}, #{scrapBoardId} )
INSERT INTO SCRAP ( SCRAP_ID, SCRAP_TYPE, MEMBERS_NO, MEDIA_ID, ) VALUES ( SEQ_SCRID.NEXTVAL, 2, #{scrapMembersNo}, #{scrapMediaId} )
